product_name: The North Face Amirite Daypack - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Inspired by the classic rucksack design from generations past, the North Face Amirite daypack serves up retro style that's been updated with lots of technical features. Large main compartment cinches closed with a drawcord; padded laptop sleeve and slip-in pockets. Vented, injection-molded shoulder straps are comfortable and breathe well. Back panel is made from comfortable, padded air-mesh. Dual, zippered side pockets and a zip-close top pocket offer convenient stashing. Exterior bellowed pockets have magnetic-flap closures. 2 quick-release buckles secure pack closed and compress your load. The North Face Amirite pack has a top carry handle. Closeout.
short_description: Inspired by the classic rucksack design from generations past, the North Face Amirite daypack serves up retro style that's been updated with lots of technical features.
